title: swain q bug
body: swain q not showing the boundary

replies.body: same for me. at first I thought it was a patch but after checking the patch notes I realize its not. personally as a swain main I like it since I know the borders and it makes it harder for my enemy to know where to dodge. but its still odd.

Im a swain main n this is throwing me off in rank n just killing the enemies cause they dont c the boundary either so fix r keep either r just make a patch saying thats is gonna be like that from now on!!!!
i would prefer to be able to see the boundary, otherwisr im pretty sure it falls under the "hidden power" category
Yeah, my friend who plays Swain just experienced the same thing. Riot, please fix this.
